mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMPNY (CMPNY_ID , CMPNY_NM , CRT_DT , CRTR , MDFY_DT , MDFYR , USE_YN , DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_CMPNY_PK.NEXTVAL , #{cmpnyNm} , SYSDATE , #{crtr} , SYSDATE , #{mdfyr} , NVL(#{useYn},'N') , 'N' )
mapper.select:
SELECT C.CMPNY_ID , C.CMPNY_NM , TO_CHAR(C.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , C.CRTR , TO_CHAR(C.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , C.MDFYR , C.USE_YN , CM.MBR_NM CRTR_NM , MM.MBR_NM MDFYR_NM FROM CMPNY C JOIN MBR CM ON CM.MBR_ID = C.CRTR JOIN MBR MM ON MM.MBR_ID = C.MDFYR WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND C.CMPNY_NM LIKE '%' || #{cmpnyNm} || '%'
ORDER BY C.CMPNY_ID
